title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config and data into a single Modelfile and serves them via a REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; supports chat, file upload, RAG and admin features.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with streaming, embeddings and tool-calling support; on Maven Central.

title: ollamaclient
summary: Official Go client used internally by the CLI; importable as a Go library.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript wrapper around the Ollama REST API with strong typing and async iterators.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and chat completions; published as NuGet ‘OllamaSharp’.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Official cross-platform CLI binary distributed with every Ollama release.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama models with session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of curated Modelfiles (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama.
